member.name: T:iTin.Core.Interop.Windows.Development.SystemServices.SystemInformation.Firmware.NativeMethods
member.summary: Functions to handle system firmware tables.

member.name: M:iTin.Core.Interop.Windows.Development.SystemServices.SystemInformation.Firmware.NativeMethods.EnumSystemFirmwareTables(iTin.Core.Interop.Windows.Development.SystemServices.SystemInformation.Firmware.KnownProvider,System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Enumerates all system firmware tables of the specified type. For more information, see https://docs.microsoft.com/es-es/windows/desktop/api/sysinfoapi/nf-sysinfoapi-enumsystemfirmwaretables.

member.name: M:iTin.Core.Interop.Windows.Development.SystemServices.SystemInformation.Firmware.NativeMethods.EnumSystemFirmwareTables(System.UInt32,System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Enumerates all system firmware tables of the specified type. For more information, see https://docs.microsoft.com/es-es/windows/desktop/api/sysinfoapi/nf-sysinfoapi-enumsystemfirmwaretables.

member.name: M:iTin.Core.Interop.Windows.Development.SystemServices.SystemInformation.Firmware.NativeMethods.GetSystemFirmwareTable(iTin.Core.Interop.Windows.Development.SystemServices.SystemInformation.Firmware.KnownProvider,System.Int32,System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the specified firmware table from the firmware table provider. For more information, see https://docs.microsoft.com/es-es/windows/desktop/api/sysinfoapi/nf-sysinfoapi-getsystemfirmwaretable.

member.name: M:iTin.Core.Interop.Windows.Development.SystemServices.SystemInformation.Firmware.NativeMethods.GetSystemFirmwareTable(System.UInt32,System.Int32,System.IntPtr,System.Int32)
member.summary: Retrieves the specified firmware table from the firmware table provider. For more information, see https://docs.microsoft.com/es-es/windows/desktop/api/sysinfoapi/nf-sysinfoapi-getsystemfirmwaretable.
